scripts.dev:setup: npm run rebuild:electron && npm run build-worker
scripts.dev:full: npm run dev:setup && npm run dev:hot
scripts.build: electron-vite build && npm run copy-migrations && npm run build-worker
scripts.build:app: npm run build:packages && npm run prepare-deps && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.build:packages: cd ../.. && pnpm --filter @neo/logger build && pnpm --filter @neo/config build && pnpm --filter @neo/shared build
scripts.build:deb: npm run prepare-deps && npm run build && electron-builder --linux deb
scripts.build:appimage: npm run prepare-deps && npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage
scripts.build:linux: npm run prepare-deps && npm run build && electron-builder --linux
scripts.copy-migrations: mkdir -p dist/main/database/migrations && cp -r src/main/database/migrations/*.js dist/main/database/migrations/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build-worker: mkdir -p dist/main/stt/workers && npx tsc src/main/stt/workers/sttWorker.ts src/main/stt/workers/fileTranscriberWorker.ts --outDir dist/main/stt/workers --module commonjs --target es2020 --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck --resolveJsonModule --moduleResolution node || true
